thread.title_full: Rivals250 safety Todd Harris of Plaquemine, Louisiana announ

author: rivals.com
title: Rivals250 safety Todd Harris of Plaquemine, Louisiana announ
text:
Rivals250 safety Todd Harris of Plaquemine, Louisiana announced on ESPNU this morning that he's signing with LSU.
Harris chose LSU over Alabama, Ole Miss, Arizona State and TCU.
"I'm just so happy to be able to live my dream and go on to play and get my education. With that said, I will be taking my talents to LSU," Harris said.
"It feels great. I grew up wanting to be a LSU Tigers. I'm excited, my parents are excited and I'm just ready to go to work," Harris said.
CLICK HERE to discuss this breaking news with other hardcore Tiger fans!
